author: albusdompeldorius
content: I have modified the current Verkle Trie proposal to support `SELFDESTRUCT`, in case we want to keep supporting it: https://github.com/adompeldorius/selfdestruct-analysis/blob/main/verkle_trie_with_selfdestruct_eip.md

author: albusdompeldorius
content: This is done by adding an `incarnation_number` to the account header which is first set to 0, and then incremented by one each time the contract selfdestructs. The code and storage indices are then offset by `256**33 * incarnation_number`.

author: albusdompeldorius
content: In addition to adding support for `SELFDESTRUCT`, I simplified the specification a bit by performing the splitting of the least significant byte of each sub-tree index with the rest as part of the function get_tree_key, instead of having `// 256` and `% 256` in multiple places.
